aspguidc.helper

Class FileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidc.helper.FileHelper

  • public class FileHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class which provides static methods regarding to the handling of files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileHelper() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void deleteFileRecursively(java.io.File file)
      Delete the given file.
      static void writeFile(java.io.File targetFile, java.lang.CharSequence fileContent)
      Write the given content to the given file.
      static void writeTemplateFile(java.lang.String relativeTemplatePath, org.jtwig.JtwigModel model, java.io.File targetDir)
      Fill the template which is stored in the subdirectory of the program_template directory in the program resources according to the given template path with the given model and write it according to the given template path to the given target directory.
      static void writeTemplateFile(java.lang.String relativeTemplatePath, org.jtwig.JtwigModel model, java.io.File targetDir, java.lang.String relativeTargetPath)
      Fill the template which is stored in the subdirectory of the program_template directory in the program resources according to the given template path with the given model and write it a subdirectory of the given target dir according to the given target path.

        public FileHelper()

    • Method Detail

      • deleteFileRecursively

        public static void deleteFileRecursively(java.io.File file)
        Delete the given file. If the given file is a directory, all files inside the directory are deleted too.
        Parameters:
        file - File which is deleted

      • writeTemplateFile

        public static void writeTemplateFile(java.lang.String relativeTemplatePath,
                                     org.jtwig.JtwigModel model,
                                     java.io.File targetDir)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Fill the template which is stored in the subdirectory of the program_template directory in the program resources according to the given template path with the given model and write it according to the given template path to the given target directory.
        Parameters:
        relativeTemplatePath - relative path of the template which is used to access the template and write the filled template
        model - model which is used to fill the template
        targetDir - directory in which the filled template is written according to the given template path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while accessing or writing the template

      • writeTemplateFile

        public static void writeTemplateFile(java.lang.String relativeTemplatePath,
                                     org.jtwig.JtwigModel model,
                                     java.io.File targetDir,
                                     java.lang.String relativeTargetPath)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Fill the template which is stored in the subdirectory of the program_template directory in the program resources according to the given template path with the given model and write it a subdirectory of the given target dir according to the given target path.
        Parameters:
        relativeTemplatePath - relative path of the template from the program_template directory in the program resources
        model - model which is used to fill the template
        targetDir - directory in which the filled template is written according to the given target path
        relativeTargetPath - relative path from the given target dir which is used to write te filled template
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while accessing or writing the template

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(java.io.File targetFile,
                             java.lang.CharSequence fileContent)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Write the given content to the given file.
        Parameters:
        targetFile - file in which the given content is written to
        fileContent - content which is written to the given file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while writing the content to the given file
